{"id":1304474292,"question_id":3469,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1719721427,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1304474292/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Height of a Triangle","memory":"7.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxHeightOfTriangle(int red, int blue) {\n        return max(Helper(blue, red), Helper(red,blue));\n    }\n    int Helper(int red, int blue) { //1 <= red, blue <= 100\n        int height = 0;\n        int i = 1;\n\n        while(true) {\n            if( i%2 ==1) {\n                if(red >=i) {\n                    red -= i;\n                } else\n                    break;\n            } else {\n                if(blue >= i) {\n                    blue -=i;\n                } else \n                    break;\n            }\n            height++;\n            i++;\n        }\n        return height; \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-height-of-a-triangle","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
